ðŸ“– Summary: Chandra is an OCR model that converts images and PDFs into structured data formats like HTML, Markdown, or JSON, preserving layout information. It supports handwriting, forms, tables, math, and complex layouts, and offers both local (HuggingFace) and remote (vLLM server) inference modes.
